doc.summary: Sets the output path for the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/server/packs/PackType">PackType</ref>.
doc.text: Sets the output path for the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/server/packs/PackType">PackType</ref>.

doc.summary: Changes the output path for the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/server/packs/PackType">PackType</ref> by <ref cls="java/nio/file/Path" method="resolve" type="(java.lang.String)java.nio.file.Path">resolving</ref> the given  sub-path to the current output path.
doc.text:
Changes the output path for the given PackType by resolving the given sub-path to the current output path. This also adds a resource prefix for resource lookup through the
PackTarget#find(PackType, ResourceLocation) method.

doc.summary: Indicates, that the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/PackTarget">PackTarget</ref> can't output the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/server/packs/PackType">PackType</ref>.
doc.text: Indicates, that the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/PackTarget">PackTarget</ref> can't output the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/server/packs/PackType">PackType</ref>.

doc.summary: Adds a path for resource lookup through <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/PackTarget" method="find" type="(net.minecraft.server.packs.PackType,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation)org.moddingx.libx.datagen.PackTarget.Resource">PackTarget#find(PackType, ResourceLocation)</ref>.
doc.text: Adds a path for resource lookup through <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/PackTarget" method="find" type="(net.minecraft.server.packs.PackType,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation)org.moddingx.libx.datagen.PackTarget.Resource">PackTarget#find(PackType, ResourceLocation)</ref>.
